org.apache.hadoop.mapred

クラス TextOutputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileOutputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextOutputFormat<K,V>
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    OutputFormat<K,V>

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class TextOutputFormat<K,V>
extends FileOutputFormat<K,V>
    An OutputFormat that writes plain text files.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getRecordWriter

        public RecordWriter<K,V> getRecordWriter(FileSystem ignored,
                                JobConf job,
                                String name,
                                Progressable progress)
                                  throws IOException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: OutputFormat
        Get the RecordWriter for the given job.
        定義:
        getRecordWriter インタフェース内 OutputFormat<K,V>
        定義:
        getRecordWriter クラス内 FileOutputFormat<K,V>
        job - configuration for the job whose output is being written.
        name - the unique name for this part of the output.
        progress - mechanism for reporting progress while writing to file.
        戻り値:
        a RecordWriter to write the output for the job.
        例外:
        IOException
